ref: 12993 saṁrambha m. ʻ vehemence, anger ʼ MBh. [Conn. rábhas -- ʻ vehemence ʼ RV. (~Lat. rabies etc. EWA iii 43) rather than √rabh]
Pa. saṁrambha -- , sārambha -- m. ʻ impetuosity, rage, quarrel ʼ;
Pk. saṁraṁbha -- , sāraṁbha -- m. ʻ determination to hurt, attack ʼ;
Si. haram̆ba ʻ brandishing, fencing, fighting ʼ.
